actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prevent an institution from participating in the Pell Grant program if the institution is ineligible for participation in the Federal Stafford Loan program because of high default rates.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prohibit an institution from participating in the Federal Pell Grants program if it is ineligible for participation in the Federal Family Education Loans program (also known as the Stafford or guaranteed student loan program) because of a high default rate.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prevent an institution from participating in the Pell Grant program if the institution is ineligible for participation in the Federal Stafford Loan program because of high default rates.
